UI: Content Card

Announcement Card

The Announcement Card displays system notifications, alerts, and important updates. Features priority level (low, medium, high, critical), announcement type (maintenance, feature, security), effective date range, target audience, action required, and dismissible status. Uses Schema.org/SpecialAnnouncement markup.
